TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDbDataAdapter implements class System.Data.IDataAdapter

summary.span: 表示一组与命令有关的属性，用于填充 和更新数据源，由访问关系数据库的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序实现。

span.span: Represents a set of command-related properties that are used to fill the and update a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口继承自接口，并允许创建 DataAdapter 设计用于关系数据库对象。The interface inherits from the interface and allows an object to create a DataAdapter designed for use with a relational database. 接口和实用程序类中，（可选） ，可以通过继承的类来实现 DataAdapter 类，表示数据源之间的桥梁和。The interface and, optionally, the utility class, , allow an inheriting class to implement a DataAdapter class, which represents the bridge between a data source and a . 关于 DataAdapter 类的详细信息，请参阅[填充数据集从 DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md)。For more information about DataAdapter classes, see [Populating a DataSet from a DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md). 有关实现.NET Framework 数据提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a9fa1926-071b-4c6f-997d-a16bac633852)。For more information about implementing .NET Framework data providers, see [[\]](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a9fa1926-071b-4c6f-997d-a16bac633852). 应用程序不会创建的实例接口直接，但创建继承的类的实例和。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits and . 继承的类必须实现继承的成员，且通常定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that inherit must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，接口定义属性，并接口定义方法采用作为参数。For example, the interface defines the property, and the interface defines a method that takes a as a parameter. 依次类继承属性和方法，并且还定义了两个重载的将 ADO 记录集对象作为参数的方法。In turn, the class inherits the property and the method, and also defines two additional overloads of the method that take an ADO Recordset object as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生的类中， ，和、 从数据源选择记录。The following example uses the derived classes, , and , to select records from a data source. 已填充然后返回。The filled is then returned. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递一个已初始化，连接字符串和是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要将升级.NET Framework 数据提供程序之间的一致性，命名为窗体中的继承类DataAdapter 其中是提供给特定的.NET Framework 数据提供程序命名空间中的所有类的统一前缀。

span.span: To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form DataAdapter where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace.

para.span: 例如，的前缀类中命名空间。

span.span: For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace.

para.span: 继承自接口，则应实现以下构造函数：

summary.span: 获取或设置用于从数据集中删除记录的 SQL 语句。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement for deleting records from the data set.

value.span: 过程中使用的 ，它针对数据集中已删除的行删除数据源中的记录。

span.span: An used during to delete records in the data source for deleted rows in the data set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息是否处在，则可以自动生成，如果您设置`SelectCommand`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后，由 CommandBuilder 生成未设置任何其他命令。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建继承的实例类，并设置和属性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于将新记录插入到数据源中的 SQL 语句。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement used to insert new records into the data source.

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，它针对数据集中的新行将记录插入到数据源。

span.span: An used during to insert records in the data source for new rows in the data set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息是否处在，则可以自动生成，如果您设置`SelectCommand`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后，由 CommandBuilder 生成未设置任何其他命令。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令返回的行，这些行可能会添加到具体取决于如何设置属性的对象。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending on how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建继承的实例类，并设置和属性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在数据源中选择记录的 SQL 语句。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement used to select records in the data source.

value.span: 在 过程中使用的 ，它从数据源中选择记录以便放入数据集中。

span.span: An that is used during to select records from data source for placement in the data set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果不返回任何行的表添加到，并不会引发异常。If the does not return any rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例创建继承的实例类，并设置和属性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息是否处在，则可以自动生成，如果您设置`SelectCommand`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后，由 CommandBuilder 生成未设置任何其他命令。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令返回的行，将这些行添加到。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows are added to the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建继承的实例类，并设置和属性。The following example creates an instance of the inherited class, and sets the and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created an object.
